summary: This document is a summary of monthly charges for an AT&T Wireless account, detailing billing information, service usage, and payment instructions. It includes a breakdown of charges, credits, and taxes, as well as customer service information. This document contains detailed records of voice usage for phone calls made from a specific account, including dates, times, call durations, and locations. The data primarily reflects incoming calls to and from Palm Beach, Florida, with various timestamps and usage metrics. This document contains detailed records of voice usage and text messaging activity for an AT&T Wireless account associated with the Epstein case. It includes timestamps, call durations, and charges for various calls made to and from locations primarily in Florida, as well as some in New York. The document is significant as it provides insight into communication patterns relevant to the investigation.
